I would recommend both "Hitch" and "You." While both movies have different genres, they both offer engaging storylines, well-developed characters, and solid direction.

Specifically, "Hitch" offers a cleverly crafted plot that keeps the audience engaged from start to finish. The movie also features some excellent performances by an all-star cast that includes Kevin Spacey, Mary-Louise Parker, and James Spader.

In contrast, "You" offers a more straightforward and less convoluted plot than "Hitch." The movie also features some very good performances by a cast that includes Salma Hayek, Quentin Tarantino, Cheech Marin, and others.

Overall, both "Hitch" and "You" offer engaging storylines, well-developed characters, and solid direction. Therefore, I would recommend both "Hitch" and "You."
